transArray.content: Service is very good but a little noisy

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. We are very sorry that this stay did not bring you a more ideal stay experience. Since the hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, each room uses double-layer soundproof glass. If you are a light sleeper, the front desk can provide you with disposable earplugs. If you have any questions during your stay, you can contact the front desk as soon as possible. , we will serve you wholeheartedly. Thank you for your valuable feedback. We will continue to improve all aspects. I believe you will have a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
